org.drupal.project.computing

Class DRestfulJsonServices

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drupal.project.computing.DRestfulJsonServices

  • public class DRestfulJsonServices
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps connect to Drupal using the services.module. Requires Drupal REST Sever module enabled. Both HTTP Request and HTTP Response will use Content-Type = application/json. Make sure to enable REST Server module with json enabled. This is a lightweight class to access Drupal REST Server without using Apache HttpClient. Use only REST Server. Use other servers might lead to unexpected error.

      • request

        public java.lang.Object request(java.lang.String directive,
                       javax.script.Bindings params,
                       java.lang.String method)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                DSiteException
        High level API to make HTTP request and get response in JSON.
        Parameters:
        directive - Services command, such as CRUD, Actions, Targeted Actions, etc.
        params - Data to send in HTTP request.
        method - HTTP Request method, e.g. GET, POST, DELETE, etc.
        Returns:
        arsed JSON object, either null, or a Primitive, or a List, or a Bindings.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        DSiteException
        See Also:
        DUtils.Json

      • httpRequest

        public java.lang.String httpRequest(java.lang.String url,
                           java.lang.String data,
                           java.lang.String method)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                    DSiteException
        Generic template to make a HTTP request.
        Parameters:
        url - The absolute URL to make request on.
        data - Extra data to pass to the URL connection.
        method - a valid HTTP request method: GET, PUT, etc in upper case. Following HttpURLConnection, this parameter is defined as a String not Enum.
        Returns:
        HTTP response in String from InputSteam (not ErrorStream). Content from ErrorStream will be passed out in DSiteException.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        DSiteException
